MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the KA7 postcode area of Ayr. We are aware of previous power issues in the area, and apologise for this. Our team are onsite and are investigating reports of a generator failure at Blairston Mains Farm. We expect power to be restored by 6.45pm. Once we receive any updates from our engineers onsite, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:41PM on Sunday 03 January 2021.
